tidyenum.h

00069 /* Enumerate configuration options
00070 */
00071 
00072 /** Categories of Tidy configuration options
00073 */
00074 typedef enum
00075 {
00076   TidyMarkup,          /**< Markup options: (X)HTML version, etc */
00077   TidyDiagnostics,     /**< Diagnostics */
00078   TidyPrettyPrint,     /**< Output layout */
00079   TidyEncoding,        /**< Character encodings */
00080   TidyMiscellaneous    /**< File handling, message format, etc. */
00081 } TidyConfigCategory;
00082 
00083 
00084 /** Option IDs Used to get/set option values.
00085 */
00086 typedef enum
00087 {
00088   TidyUnknownOption,   /**< Unknown option! */
00089   TidyIndentSpaces,    /**< Indentation n spaces */
00090   TidyWrapLen,         /**< Wrap margin */
00091   TidyTabSize,         /**< Expand tabs to n spaces */
00092 
00093   TidyCharEncoding,    /**< In/out character encoding */
00094   TidyInCharEncoding,  /**< Input character encoding (if different) */
00095   TidyOutCharEncoding, /**< Output character encoding (if different) */    
00096   TidyNewline,         /**< Output line ending (default to platform) */
00097 
00098   TidyDoctypeMode,     /**< See doctype property */
00099   TidyDoctype,         /**< User specified doctype */
00100 
00101   TidyDuplicateAttrs,  /**< Keep first or last duplicate attribute */
00102   TidyAltText,         /**< Default text for alt attribute */
00103   
00104   /* obsolete */
00105   TidySlideStyle,      /**< Style sheet for slides: not used for anything yet */
00106 
00107   TidyErrFile,         /**< File name to write errors to */
00108   TidyOutFile,         /**< File name to write markup to */
00109   TidyWriteBack,       /**< If true then output tidied markup */
00110   TidyShowMarkup,      /**< If false, normal output is suppressed */
00111   TidyShowWarnings,    /**< However errors are always shown */
00112   TidyQuiet,           /**< No 'Parsing X', guessed DTD or summary */
00113   TidyIndentContent,   /**< Indent content of appropriate tags */
00114                        /**< "auto" does text/block level content indentation */
00115   TidyHideEndTags,     /**< Suppress optional end tags */
00116   TidyXmlTags,         /**< Treat input as XML */
00117   TidyXmlOut,          /**< Create output as XML */
00118   TidyXhtmlOut,        /**< Output extensible HTML */
00119   TidyHtmlOut,         /**< Output plain HTML, even for XHTML input.
00120                            Yes means set explicitly. */
00121   TidyXmlDecl,         /**< Add <?xml?> for XML docs */
00122   TidyUpperCaseTags,   /**< Output tags in upper not lower case */
00123   TidyUpperCaseAttrs,  /**< Output attributes in upper not lower case */
00124   TidyMakeBare,        /**< Make bare HTML: remove Microsoft cruft */
00125   TidyMakeClean,       /**< Replace presentational clutter by style rules */
00126   TidyLogicalEmphasis, /**< Replace i by em and b by strong */
00127   TidyDropPropAttrs,   /**< Discard proprietary attributes */
00128   TidyDropFontTags,    /**< Discard presentation tags */
00129   TidyDropEmptyParas,  /**< Discard empty p elements */
00130   TidyDropEmptyOptions,/**< Discard empty option elements [i_a] */
00131   TidyFixComments,     /**< Fix comments with adjacent hyphens */
00132   TidyBreakBeforeBR,   /**< Output newline before <br> or not? */
00133 
00134   /* obsolete */
00135   TidyBurstSlides,     /**< Create slides on each h2 element */
00136 
00137   TidyNumEntities,     /**< Use numeric entities */
00138   TidyQuoteMarks,      /**< Output " marks as &quot; */
00139   TidyQuoteNbsp,       /**< Output non-breaking space as entity */
00140   TidyQuoteAmpersand,  /**< Output naked ampersand as &amp; */
00141   TidyWrapAttVals,     /**< Wrap within attribute values */
00142   TidyWrapScriptlets,  /**< Wrap within JavaScript string literals */
00143   TidyWrapSection,     /**< Wrap within <![ ... ]> section tags */
00144   TidyWrapAsp,         /**< Wrap within ASP pseudo elements */
00145   TidyWrapJste,        /**< Wrap within JSTE pseudo elements */
00146   TidyWrapPhp,         /**< Wrap within PHP pseudo elements */
00147   TidyFixBackslash,    /**< Fix URLs by replacing \ with / */
00148   TidyIndentAttributes,/**< Newline+indent before each attribute */
00149   TidyXmlPIs,          /**< If set to yes PIs must end with ?> */
00150   TidyXmlSpace,        /**< If set to yes adds xml:space attr as needed */
00151   TidyEncloseBodyText, /**< If yes text at body is wrapped in P's */
00152   TidyEncloseBlockText,/**< If yes text in blocks is wrapped in P's */
00153   TidyKeepFileTimes,   /**< If yes last modied time is preserved */
00154   TidyWord2000,        /**< Draconian cleaning for Word2000 */
00155   TidyMark,            /**< Add meta element indicating tidied doc */
00156   TidyEmacs,           /**< If true format error output for GNU Emacs */
00157   TidyEmacsFile,       /**< Name of current Emacs file */
00158   TidyLiteralAttribs,  /**< If true attributes may use newlines */
00159   TidyBodyOnly,        /**< Output BODY content only */
00160   TidyFixUri,          /**< Applies URI encoding if necessary */
00161   TidyLowerLiterals,   /**< Folds known attribute values to lower case */
00162   TidyHideComments,    /**< Hides all (real) comments in output */
00163   TidyIndentCdata,     /**< Indent <!CDATA[ ... ]]> section */
00164   TidyForceOutput,     /**< Output document even if errors were found */
00165   TidyShowErrors,      /**< Number of errors to put out */
00166   TidyAsciiChars,      /**< Convert quotes and dashes to nearest ASCII char */
00167   TidyJoinClasses,     /**< Join multiple class attributes */
00168   TidyJoinStyles,      /**< Join multiple style attributes */
00169   TidyEscapeCdata,     /**< Replace <![CDATA[]]> sections with escaped text */
00170 
00171 #if SUPPORT_ASIAN_ENCODINGS
00172   TidyLanguage,        /**< Language property: not used for anything yet */
00173   TidyNCR,             /**< Allow numeric character references */
00174 #else
00175   TidyLanguageNotUsed,
00176   TidyNCRNotUsed,
00177 #endif
00178 #if SUPPORT_UTF16_ENCODINGS
00179   TidyOutputBOM,      /**< Output a Byte Order Mark (BOM) for UTF-16 encodings */
00180                       /**< auto: if input stream has BOM, we output a BOM */
00181 #else
00182   TidyOutputBOMNotUsed,
00183 #endif
00184 
00185   TidyReplaceColor,    /**< Replace hex color attribute values with names */
00186   TidyCSSPrefix,       /**< CSS class naming for -clean option */
00187 
00188   TidyInlineTags,      /**< Declared inline tags */
00189   TidyBlockTags,       /**< Declared block tags */
00190   TidyEmptyTags,       /**< Declared empty tags */
00191   TidyPreTags,         /**< Declared pre tags */
00192   TidyOtherNamespaceTags, /**< Declared 'alternate namespace' tags, i.e. tags which contain subtrees with non-HTML tags, e.g. <math> and <svg> */
00193 
00194   TidyAccessibilityCheckLevel, /**< Accessibility check level 
00195                                    0 (old style), or 1, 2, 3 */
00196 
00197   TidyVertSpace,       /**< degree to which markup is spread out vertically */
00198 #if SUPPORT_ASIAN_ENCODINGS
00199   TidyPunctWrap,       /**< consider punctuation and breaking spaces for wrapping */
00200 #else
00201   TidyPunctWrapNotUsed,
00202 #endif
00203   TidyMergeDivs,       /**< Merge multiple DIVs */
00204   TidyDecorateInferredUL,  /**< Mark inferred UL elements with no indent CSS */
00205   TidyPreserveEntities,    /**< Preserve entities */
00206   TidySortAttributes,      /**< Sort attributes */
00207   TidyMergeSpans,       /**< Merge multiple SPANs */
00208   TidyAnchorAsName,    /**< Define anchors as name attributes */
00209   TidyTitle,           /**< Fix an empty title element by filling it with a copy of the first header element in the document body */ /* [i_a] */
00210   TidySuppressEmptyTagSyntax,    /**< Suppress empty tag syntax in the output, i.e. write '<div id="1"></div>' instead of '<div id="1" />' */ /* [i_a] */
00211   TidyFixBrakes,       /**< Remove '<br />' from paragraphs (and other block elements); this option conditionally enables the 2003AD code which was turned off due to bug report http://tidy.sf.net/bug/681116 */ /* [i_a] */
00212 
00213   N_TIDY_OPTIONS       /**< Must be last */
00214 } TidyOptionId;
00215 
00216 /** Option data types
00217 */
00218 typedef enum
00219 {
00220   TidyString,          /**< String */
00221   TidyInteger,         /**< Integer or enumeration */
00222   TidyBoolean          /**< Boolean flag */
00223 } TidyOptionType;
00224 
00225 
00226 /** AutoBool values used by ParseBool, ParseTriState, ParseIndent, ParseBOM
00227 */
00228 typedef enum
00229 {
00230    TidyNoState,     /**< maps to 'no' */
00231    TidyYesState,    /**< maps to 'yes' */
00232    TidyAutoState    /**< Automatic */
00233 } TidyTriState;
00234 
00235 /** TidyNewline option values to control output line endings.
00236 */
00237 typedef enum
00238 {
00239     TidyLF,         /**< Use Unix style: LF */
00240     TidyCRLF,       /**< Use DOS/Windows style: CR+LF */
00241     TidyCR          /**< Use Macintosh style: CR */
00242 } TidyLineEnding;
00243 
00244 
00245 /** Mode controlling treatment of doctype
00246 */
00247 typedef enum
00248 {
00249     TidyDoctypeOmit,    /**< Omit DOCTYPE altogether */
00250     TidyDoctypeAuto,    /**< Keep DOCTYPE in input.  Set version to content */
00251     TidyDoctypeStrict,  /**< Convert document to HTML 4 strict content model */
00252     TidyDoctypeLoose,   /**< Convert document to HTML 4 transitional
00253                              content model */
00254     TidyDoctypeUser     /**< Set DOCTYPE FPI explicitly */
00255 } TidyDoctypeModes;
00256 
00257 /** Mode controlling treatment of duplicate Attributes
00258 */
00259 typedef enum
00260 {
00261     TidyKeepFirst,
00262     TidyKeepLast
00263 } TidyDupAttrModes;
00264 
00265 /** Mode controlling treatment of sorting attributes
00266 */
00267 typedef enum
00268 {
00269     TidySortAttrNone,
00270     TidySortAttrAlpha
00271 } TidyAttrSortStrategy;
00272 
00273 /* I/O and Message handling interface
00274 **
00275 ** By default, Tidy will define, create and use 
00276 ** instances of input and output handlers for 
00277 ** standard C buffered I/O (i.e. FILE* stdin,
00278 ** FILE* stdout and FILE* stderr for content
00279 ** input, content output and diagnostic output,
00280 ** respectively.  A FILE* cfgFile input handler
00281 ** will be used for config files.  Command line
00282 ** options will just be set directly.
00283 */
00284 
00285 /** Message severity level
00286 */
00287 typedef enum 
00288 {
00289   TidyInfo,             /**< Information about markup usage */
00290   TidyWarning,          /**< Warning message */
00291   TidyConfig,           /**< Configuration error */
00292   TidyAccess,           /**< Accessibility message */
00293   TidyError,            /**< Error message - output suppressed */
00294   TidyBadDocument,      /**< I/O or file system error */
00295   TidyFatal             /**< Crash! */
00296 } TidyReportLevel;
00297 
00298 
00299 /* Document tree traversal functions
00300 */
00301 
00302 /** Node types
00303 */
00304 typedef enum 
00305 {
00306   TidyNode_Root,        /**< Root */
00307   TidyNode_DocType,     /**< DOCTYPE */
00308   TidyNode_Comment,     /**< Comment */
00309   TidyNode_ProcIns,     /**< Processing Instruction */
00310   TidyNode_Text,        /**< Text */
00311   TidyNode_Start,       /**< Start Tag */
00312   TidyNode_End,         /**< End Tag */
00313   TidyNode_StartEnd,    /**< Start/End (empty) Tag */
00314   TidyNode_CDATA,       /**< Unparsed Text */
00315   TidyNode_Section,     /**< XML Section */
00316   TidyNode_Asp,         /**< ASP Source */
00317   TidyNode_Jste,        /**< JSTE Source */
00318   TidyNode_Php,         /**< PHP Source */
00319   TidyNode_XmlDecl      /**< XML Declaration */
00320 } TidyNodeType;
00321

00637 
00638 
00639 /* [i_a] */
00640 /** Block-level and unknown elements are printed on
00641   new lines and their contents indented 2 spaces.
00642 
00643   Inline elements are printed inline.
00644 
00645   Inline content is wrapped on spaces (except in
00646   attribute values or preformatted text, after
00647   start tags and before end tags.
00648 */
00649 typedef enum
00650 {
00651         TidyTextFormat_Normal = 0x0000, /**< NORMAL (default) */
00652         TidyTextFormat_Preformatted = 0x0001,   /**< PREFORMATTED */
00653         TidyTextFormat_Comment = 0x0002,        /**< COMMENT */
00654         TidyTextFormat_AttribValue = 0x0004,    /**< ATTRIBVALUE */
00655         TidyTextFormat_NoWrap = 0x0008, /**< NOWRAP */
00656         TidyTextFormat_CDATA = 0x0010,  /**< CDATA */
00657         TidyTextFormat_OtherNamespace = 0x0020, /**< print subtree as XML */
00658 } TidyTextFormat; 
00659 /* Warning: TidyTextFormat values must match the #define's in pprint.h exactly! */
00660
